text: Knema bengalensis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Bangladesh. Its type was collected in the Chittagong District of Bangladesh, and in 1997 it was classed as vulnerable on the IUCN red list. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema bengalensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
